EmailTemplate.description: Notification sent to case submitter to notify them their case has been closed.
EmailTemplate.name: SS-AP Case Resolved
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Accounts Payable Helpdesk Inquiry, Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}, has successfully been closed [{!Case.Thread_Id}] Votre demande au bureau d'aide des comptes payables, cas # {!Case.CaseNumber} a été fermé avec
